mapper.insert: INSERT into course(course_id, course_name, course_description, teacher_id, semester, academic_year) value (#{courseId}, #{courseName}, #{courseDescription}, #{teacherId}, #{semester}, #{academicYear})
mapper.select: select course_id as courseId, course_description as courseDescription, course_name as courseName, semester as semester, academic_year as academicYear, teacher_id as teacherId, username as teacherName from course, user where course_id = #{courseId} and teacher_id = user_id

select course_id as courseId, course_description as courseDescription, course_name as courseName, semester as semester, academic_year as academicYear, teacher_id as teacherId, username as teacherName from course, user where teacher_id = #{teacherId} and teacher_id = user_id
